00027 /* Attribute */
00028 
00029 void Attribute::set(ustring name_, TypeDesc type_, Element element_)
00030 {
00031     name = name_;
00032     type = type_;
00033     element = element_;
00034     std = STD_NONE;
00035 
00036     /* string and matrix not supported! */
00037     assert(type == TypeDesc::TypeFloat || type == TypeDesc::TypeColor ||
00038         type == TypeDesc::TypePoint || type == TypeDesc::TypeVector ||
00039         type == TypeDesc::TypeNormal);
00040 }
00041 
00042 void Attribute::reserve(int numverts, int numtris)
00043 {
00044     buffer.resize(buffer_size(numverts, numtris), 0);
00045 }
00046 
00047 size_t Attribute::data_sizeof()
00048 {
00049     if(type == TypeDesc::TypeFloat)
00050         return sizeof(float);
00051     else
00052         return sizeof(float3);
00053 }
00054 
00055 size_t Attribute::element_size(int numverts, int numtris)
00056 {
00057     if(element == VERTEX)
00058         return numverts;
00059     else if(element == FACE)
00060         return numtris;
00061     else
00062         return numtris*3;
00063 }
00064 
00065 size_t Attribute::buffer_size(int numverts, int numtris)
00066 {
00067     return element_size(numverts, numtris)*data_sizeof();
00068 }
00069 
00070 bool Attribute::same_storage(TypeDesc a, TypeDesc b)
00071 {
00072     if(a == b)
00073         return true;
00074     
00075     if(a == TypeDesc::TypeColor || a == TypeDesc::TypePoint ||
00076        a == TypeDesc::TypeVector || a == TypeDesc::TypeNormal)
00077         if(b == TypeDesc::TypeColor || b == TypeDesc::TypePoint ||
00078            b == TypeDesc::TypeVector || b == TypeDesc::TypeNormal)
00079             return true;
00080     
00081     return false;
00082 }
00083 
00084 ustring Attribute::standard_name(Attribute::Standard std)
00085 {
00086     if(std == Attribute::STD_VERTEX_NORMAL)
00087         return ustring("N");
00088     else if(std == Attribute::STD_FACE_NORMAL)
00089         return ustring("Ng");
00090     else if(std == Attribute::STD_UV)
00091         return ustring("uv");
00092     else if(std == Attribute::STD_GENERATED)
00093         return ustring("generated");
00094     else if(std == Attribute::STD_POSITION_UNDEFORMED)
00095         return ustring("undeformed");
00096     else if(std == Attribute::STD_POSITION_UNDISPLACED)
00097         return ustring("undisplaced");
00098 
00099     return ustring();
00100 }

00102 /* Attribute Set */
00103 
00104 AttributeSet::AttributeSet()
00105 {
00106     mesh = NULL;
00107 }
00108 
00109 AttributeSet::~AttributeSet()
00110 {
00111 }
00112 
00113 Attribute *AttributeSet::add(ustring name, TypeDesc type, Attribute::Element element)
00114 {
00115     Attribute *attr = find(name);
00116 
00117     if(attr) {
00118         /* return if same already exists */
00119         if(attr->type == type && attr->element == element)
00120             return attr;
00121 
00122         /* overwrite attribute with same name but different type/element */
00123         remove(name);
00124     }
00125 
00126     attributes.push_back(Attribute());
00127     attr = &attributes.back();
00128 
00129     if(element == Attribute::VERTEX)
00130         attr->set(name, type, element);
00131     else if(element == Attribute::FACE)
00132         attr->set(name, type, element);
00133     else if(element == Attribute::CORNER)
00134         attr->set(name, type, element);
00135     
00136     if(mesh)
00137         attr->reserve(mesh->verts.size(), mesh->triangles.size());
00138     
00139     return attr;
00140 }
00141 
00142 Attribute *AttributeSet::find(ustring name)
00143 {
00144     foreach(Attribute& attr, attributes)
00145         if(attr.name == name)
00146             return &attr;
00147 
00148     return NULL;
00149 }
00150 
00151 void AttributeSet::remove(ustring name)
00152 {
00153     Attribute *attr = find(name);
00154 
00155     if(attr) {
00156         list<Attribute>::iterator it;
00157 
00158         for(it = attributes.begin(); it != attributes.end(); it++) {
00159             if(&*it == attr) {
00160                 attributes.erase(it);
00161                 return;
00162             }
00163         }
00164     }
00165 }
00166 
00167 Attribute *AttributeSet::add(Attribute::Standard std, ustring name)
00168 {
00169     Attribute *attr = NULL;
00170 
00171     if(name == ustring())
00172         name = Attribute::standard_name(std);
00173 
00174     if(std == Attribute::STD_VERTEX_NORMAL)
00175         attr = add(name, TypeDesc::TypeNormal, Attribute::VERTEX);
00176     else if(std == Attribute::STD_FACE_NORMAL)
00177         attr = add(name, TypeDesc::TypeNormal, Attribute::FACE);
00178     else if(std == Attribute::STD_UV)
00179         attr = add(name, TypeDesc::TypePoint, Attribute::CORNER);
00180     else if(std == Attribute::STD_GENERATED)
00181         attr = add(name, TypeDesc::TypePoint, Attribute::VERTEX);
00182     else if(std == Attribute::STD_POSITION_UNDEFORMED)
00183         attr = add(name, TypeDesc::TypePoint, Attribute::VERTEX);
00184     else if(std == Attribute::STD_POSITION_UNDISPLACED)
00185         attr = add(name, TypeDesc::TypePoint, Attribute::VERTEX);
00186     else
00187         assert(0);
00188 
00189     attr->std = std;
00190     
00191     return attr;
00192 }
00193 
00194 Attribute *AttributeSet::find(Attribute::Standard std)
00195 {
00196     foreach(Attribute& attr, attributes)
00197         if(attr.std == std)
00198             return &attr;
00199 
00200     return NULL;
00201 }
00202 
00203 void AttributeSet::remove(Attribute::Standard std)
00204 {
00205     Attribute *attr = find(std);
00206 
00207     if(attr) {
00208         list<Attribute>::iterator it;
00209 
00210         for(it = attributes.begin(); it != attributes.end(); it++) {
00211             if(&*it == attr) {
00212                 attributes.erase(it);
00213                 return;
00214             }
00215         }
00216     }
00217 }
00218 
00219 Attribute *AttributeSet::find(AttributeRequest& req)
00220 {
00221     if(req.std == Attribute::STD_NONE)
00222         return find(req.name);
00223     else
00224         return find(req.std);
00225 }
00226 
00227 void AttributeSet::reserve(int numverts, int numtris)
00228 {
00229     foreach(Attribute& attr, attributes)
00230         attr.reserve(numverts, numtris);
00231 }
00232 
00233 void AttributeSet::clear()
00234 {
00235     attributes.clear();
00236 }

00243     std = Attribute::STD_NONE;

00245     type = TypeDesc::TypeFloat;
00246     element = ATTR_ELEMENT_NONE;
00247     offset = 0;

00253     std = std_;
00254

00256     element = ATTR_ELEMENT_NONE;
00257     offset = 0;

00263 {
00264 }

00266 AttributeRequestSet::~AttributeRequestSet()
00267 {
00268 }
00269 
00270 bool AttributeRequestSet::modified(const AttributeRequestSet& other)
00271 {
00272     if(requests.size() != other.requests.size())
00273         return true;
00274 
00275     for(size_t i = 0; i < requests.size(); i++) {
00276         bool found = false;
00277 
00278         for(size_t j = 0; j < requests.size() && !found; j++)
00279             if(requests[i].name == other.requests[j].name &&
00280                requests[i].std == other.requests[j].std)
00281                 found = true;
00282 
00283         if(!found)
00284             return true;
00285     }
00286 
00287     return false;
00288 }
00289 
00290 void AttributeRequestSet::add(ustring name)
00291 {
00292     foreach(AttributeRequest& req, requests)
00293         if(req.name == name)
00294             return;
00295 
00296     requests.push_back(AttributeRequest(name));
00297 }

00299 void AttributeRequestSet::add(Attribute::Standard std)
00300 {
00301     foreach(AttributeRequest& req, requests)
00302         if(req.std == std)
00303             return;
00304 
00305     requests.push_back(AttributeRequest(std));
00306 }
00307 
00308 void AttributeRequestSet::add(AttributeRequestSet& reqs)
00309 {
00310     foreach(AttributeRequest& req, reqs.requests) {
00311         if(req.std == Attribute::STD_NONE)
00312             add(req.name);
00313         else
00314             add(req.std);
00315     }
00316 }
00317 
00318 bool AttributeRequestSet::find(ustring name)
00319 {
00320     foreach(AttributeRequest& req, requests)
00321         if(req.name == name)
00322             return true;
00323     
00324     return false;
00325 }

00327 bool AttributeRequestSet::find(Attribute::Standard std)
00328 {
00329     foreach(AttributeRequest& req, requests)
00330         if(req.std == std)
00331             return true;
00332 
00333     return false;
00334 }

00336 size_t AttributeRequestSet::size()
00337 {
00338     return requests.size();

00341 void AttributeRequestSet::clear()
